name: Kananaskis Country Trail Guide 4th Edition Volume 3
categories: Kananaskis Country Trail Guide 4th Edition Vo
description: With over 100,000 copies of the previous editions sold, this best-selling guide to Kananaskis Country has been reformatted, revised and updated. As an expert on the area, the author continues to offer something for every foot traveller, scramblers, novice hikers, or experienced The detailed text, colour photos and maps will help you navigate safely through this complex and beautiful area. Covers the Ghost-Bow Valley-Canmore-Spray areas.
